title: [Question] GYM IN Electronic City
content: I saw The Gym inside the campus is top notch but first yearâ€™s hostel is 6-7 kms away from the college so how do first years actually use that gym or they join some other gym for first year and then switch to college one?

comments.body: I am in the same posn thinking of joining the outside gym
Isn't there a gym in amaatra campus too?
Idk i scrolled through this sub and found that one inside the hostel is shit
I think it wasn't built around that time, but when I visited the campus in June I did see a gym. Don't know if it's allowed for us tho
In the campus or the hostel?
In the hostel, there's one in the campus already
You can just get your kit bag to college and after classes change and go to gym that's all
There are plenty gyms near hostel also no issues ,like iron regime etc.
is the gym open on weekends?
